column4: Hi guys, i sudo apt-get autoremoved kubuntu, but the xserver login screen for it is still there and is complaining about letting me log in.
I want to take care of this. What's the syntax for removed the xserver login for kubuntu?
how did you install it, package kubuntu-desktop?
yeah.
kubuntu-desktop is what is known as a meta-package, it is difficult to uninstall
it installs a lot of other packages
not impossible: http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnome
is there a package name that installs strictly the desktop?
thank you so much.
read through the package list and make sure you aren't removing anything you want.
